basics.name: Aviation Supply Specialist
basics.label: Inventory & Stock Management Professional
basics.summary: Organized professional with superior work ethic and team player attitude. Exceptional quality control, inspection abilities. Service-minded Stock Management professional with over 8 years of experience. Experienced Stock Clerk with over 8 years of experience. Enthusiastic individual with superior skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Tracked inventory, conducted cycle counts and audits and resolved issues to maintain accurate records. Replenished inventory with focus on addressing customer needs.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Improved customer satisfaction by finding creative solutions to problems. Enforced safety regulations and FAA standards governing production, maintenance and operation of aircraft.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Created safe environment, preventing falls and accidents. Motivated clients to perform physical exercise according to age and abilities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Monitored employee performance and safety. Sustained safety protocols to ensure proper, cost-effective and safe handling of equipment and materials.
